thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: rachael hayton

author: rachael hayton
title: rachael hayton
text: when I found this website I thought it was too good to be true. but we've just had our first set of house sitters and its been brilliant. the dogs loved staying at home and we loved not paying for kennel fees. I was a bit sceptical at first - who would want to live in my house for 2 weeks, but there were 3 applicants within 24hrs. will be using from now on when we go away
